an3.73:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
an3.73:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava gilana vutthito hoti aciravutthito gelanna.
an3.73:1.4: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.73:1.5: “digharattaham, bhante, bhagavata evam dhammam desitam ajanami:
an3.73:1.7: Samadhi nu kho, bhante, pubbe, paccha nanam;
an3.73:1.11: Ayanca mahanamo sakko bhagavantam atigambhiram panham pucchati.
an3.73:1.12: Yannunaham mahanamam sakkam ekamantam apanetva dhammam deseyyan”ti.
an3.73:2.1: Atha kho ayasma anando mahanamam sakkam bahayam gahetva ekamantam apanetva mahanamam sakkam etadavoca:
an3.73:2.2: “sekhampi kho, mahanama, silam vuttam bhagavata, asekhampi silam vuttam bhagavata; sekhopi samadhi vutto bhagavata, asekhopi samadhi vutto bhagavata; sekhapi panna vutta bhagavata, asekhapi panna vutta bhagavata.
an3.73:2.4: Idha, mahanama, bhikkhu silava hoti patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.73:3.2: Idha, mahanama, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an3.73:4.2: Idha, mahanama, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.73:5.1: Sa kho so, mahanama, ariyasavako evam silasampanno evam samadhisampanno evam pannasampanno asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an3.73:5.2: Evam kho, mahanama, sekhampi silam vuttam bhagavata, asekhampi silam vuttam bhagavata; sekhopi samadhi vutto bhagavata, asekhopi samadhi vutto bhagavata; sekhapi panna vutta bhagavata, asekhapi panna vutta bhagavata”ti.
